channel.title: NineDivine Econ/Skill/pvp/pvming 562
channel.description:
play now (webclient): http://ninedivine.net/play.html download client: http://ninedivine.net/webclient.jar website: ninedivine.net forums: forumchoice.com Ninedivine is a Skilling/pvm/pvp/eco server! *All 25 skills working *We offer over 25 outstanding bosses with unique drops *Flawless pking *Stable eco *Great Dedicated owner/coder/developer
Features: *Revenants! - drops pvp armours! *Nex! - drops (Torva/Pernix/Virtus/Zbow) *Corporeal beast! - drops All sigils (Divine/Arcane/Elysian/spectral) *100% Curses prayer! (Turmoil/Soulsplit) *Overloads! *Completionist cape! *Max cape! *Zombies minigame! *100%Working Custom dungeoneering! * All Chaotics *Primal Armour/weapons *Korasi sword! 100% working spec! *100% Dicing! *Clans/lootshare! *Highscores! *New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game) *Holiday events! *Server point system! *Pk point system! *Vote point system! *Lodestone network *Frost dragons *Wyverns! *Slayer tower!
*We have more then 25 bosses*
*Gwd *Nex! *Balanced elemental *Pheonix *Bork *barrel chest *ice king *slash bash *sea troll queen *Giant mole *Damis *Jungle demon *Penance queen *Kalphite queen! *Tormented demons *Tarn *Chaos ele *Korshei the deathless *Ulfric *New boss, 'Grecoloco' about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks * Many more!!!
[Skilling Misc] +::skilling zone! + Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they're only for your player rank via ::myrank) + Skills go to 126 - Level 126 = 190m xp! +Yell titles change depending on your total level/server points + Rune essence mine, and teleport + Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience) +Time Counter, counts your total time played +::bank command for anyone above 2,200 total level (or any level if you're member) +Summoning pets +Moderate xp rates!

item.title: NineDivine Econ/Skill/pvp/pvming 562
item.dc:creator: @lil_skillerz lil skillerz
item.description:
@lil_skillerz wrote:

Well theres loads of bugs, pking on this isn’t flawless its not good at all theres so many bugs, specials with weapons are not correct.

Owner is never on.

Most of the bosses drop the same items lol.

No auto vote system…

Be good if u fix them all.

Read full topic

item.description:
@lizard44 wrote:

play now (webclient): http://ninedivine.net/play.html
download client: http://ninedivine.net/webclient.jar
website: ninedivine.net
forums: forumchoice.com
Ninedivine is a Skilling/pvm/pvp/eco server!
*All 25 skills working
*We offer over 25 outstanding bosses with unique drops
*Flawless pking
*Stable eco
*Great Dedicated owner/coder/developer

Features:
*Revenants! - drops pvp armours!
*Nex! - drops (Torva/Pernix/Virtus/Zbow)
*Corporeal beast! - drops All sigils (Divine/Arcane/Elysian/spectral)
*100% Curses prayer! (Turmoil/Soulsplit)
*Overloads!
*Completionist cape!
*Max cape!
*Zombies minigame!
*100%Working Custom dungeoneering!

  • All Chaotics
    *Primal Armour/weapons
    *Korasi sword! 100% working spec!
    *100% Dicing!
    *Clans/lootshare!
    *Highscores!
    *New bows available from the vote shop (fastest bows in game)
    *Holiday events!
    *Server point system!
    *Pk point system!
    *Vote point system!
    *Lodestone network
    *Frost dragons
    *Wyverns!
    *Slayer tower!

We have more then 25 bosses

*Gwd
*Nex!
*Balanced elemental
*Pheonix
*Bork
*barrel chest
*ice king
*slash bash
*sea troll queen
*Giant mole
*Damis
*Jungle demon
*Penance queen
*Kalphite queen!
*Tormented demons
*Tarn
*Chaos ele
*Korshei the deathless
*Ulfric
*New boss, ‘Grecoloco’ about 1,600 hit points, different types of attacks

  • Many more!!!

[Skilling Misc]
+::skilling zone!

  • Each level up gives you +5 server points (server points cannot be spent, they’re only for your player rank via ::myrank)
  • Skills go to 126 - Level 126 = 190m xp!
    +Yell titles change depending on your total level/server points
  • Rune essence mine, and teleport
  • Quick firemaking cube (click on it, and it takes all your logs and converts them to experience)
    +Time Counter, counts your total time played
    +::bank command for anyone above 2,200 total level (or any level if you’re member)
    +Summoning pets
    +Moderate xp rates!
